name: Saptarshi Sarkar
bio: A software developer and an open-source enthusiast!

milestones.title: Started Open-source contribution
milestones.description: Open-source contribution by fixing outdated links, typos, bug reports, code review and collaborating to improve repositories. My world changed!

milestones.title: First Hacktoberfest Participation
milestones.description: Participated in Hacktoberfest as a maintainer. Reviewed many PRs and had a great experience of Open-source
